text: This version sounds a little weird, can't place my finger on what exactly's odd. Something about channels? Is it the original Amiga version?
author: Rane

text: The Stereo splitting on the Paula chip (in Amigas) was LRRL  - as in you could play four sounds a time and the channels were hard-set as to their stereo position. Music from Amiga days sounds a little odd in stereo. I am used to the normally cruel sensation of a bass drum in only one ear.

author: Vordox

text:
Ironic thing is that war was never as little fun as when the game was finally over in cannon fodder. 

Out of many games i have played, this one actually made me feel bad about what i had done when I looked at the list of all the dead scrolling by.

Definitely one of the rare pieces that gives a bit more healthy message about war in the end.
